home.jobTitle: I'm Ye Han, a professional Software Engineer
home.info: Hello, I am Ye Han, a Software Engineer
home.info1: I specialize in industrial informatization, with
home.info2: years extensive expertise in the development of MES (Manufacturing Execution Systems) and WMS (Warehouse Management Systems). My core technical stack includes C#, ASP.NET Core, Vue, and SQL Server.
home.info3: Throughout my career, I have excelled at handling complex business logic and quickly responding to on-site requirements. I am adept at bridging the gap between technical systems and production workflows through efficient design and system optimizations, ensuring that software solutions align perfectly with operational needs.
